sense.def:
A lodge
je majhna hiša ob vhodu na dvorišče velike stavbe.

A lodge
je tudi koča, v kateri ljudje prebivajo med počitnicami.

seg.quote: They went to a shooting lodge in Scotland for the weekend.

sense.def:
To lodge in someone else's house
pomeni določen čas živeti v tuji hiši, navadno v zameno za plačilo stanarine.

seg.quote: He had arranged for me to lodge with his daughter.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
lodges somewhere
ali
is lodged somewhere
, se nekam zatakne.

seg.quote: The bullet had lodged a quarter of an inch from his spine.
I had somehow got the bone lodged in my throat.

sense.def:
To lodge a complaint
pomeni uradno se pritožiti;

seg.quote: ...the charges that had been lodged against them.
